HCUP Summary Statistics Report: WV SID 2001 - COREFrequency Distribution for DRG18
DRG18
1: CRANIOTOMY AGE >17 EXCEPT FOR TRAUMA
2: CRANIOTOMY FOR TRAUMA AGE >17
